channel.title: [377]Chaospker V3 - Finally Started - New features - Will be released[377]
channel.description:
Base: Ddsspeced Client Base: Ddsspeced Revision: 377 Type of server: Pking - Will be transformed to an economized
Well it's summer time
So, I decided it's time to start up in RSPS again and make a new server.
This time my goals are way higher though. Before I aimed for content only. Now, I aim for content and stability.
I was going to do a development team but I decided I'm better off going solo. Sorry to anyone who applied We can work on something some other time though, I promise!
[b][size=14pt]My Goals[/size][/b] Clean Dead Codes Object Orientated (Thanks for suggestions from The Soul) Give the server some uniqueness Economize server (v2 relied on shops and NPC drops) Add Some new features Make the client nice and pretty Rewrite an entire skill or two (Still debating which ones - Thanks for the suggestion JaydenD12) Rewrite combat system Remove stupid customs Remove quests Add some 474 items More coming soon...
[b][size=14pt]Media[/size][/b] [size=8pt]Clan Chat - I DO NOT TAKE CREDIT FOR THIS [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/development1-1.jpg[/img] GUI - This was by me, believe it or not [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/development2-1.jpg[/img] [/size] [b]May 26th - [/b] Fixed up Barrows rewards [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/development6.jpg[/img] Cleaned up the home, spread out npcs, portals and added new dialouges [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/development3-1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/development5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/development4.jpg[/img]
More coming soon...
[b][size=14pt]Credits[/size][/b] - [b]Mackenzie (ChaosPkers)[/b] - [b]Kingdomkey01 and Danielle[/b] - Always been my right hand guys :) Kingdom does a lot to help me and he puts up with a lot of my shit so I owe him. Thanks
More credits as more people help
Thanks for reading! Reply and wish me lucks.
If you have any suggestions leave it here please, like this:
[code] My suggestion(s) -
If this is replacing an old feature, what would you say is wrong with it? -
If the coder is unable to do this, could you help? - [/code]

OT: very nice, but in your user GUI, if you have to select the player to perform an action, how can you un-ban them if they arent online because theyre banned? (using the user gui)[/quote]
its a 317 loading a 377 cache.

item.title: [377]Chaospker V3 - Finally Started - New features - Will be released[377]
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

Base: Ddsspeced
Client Base: Ddsspeced
Revision: 377
Type of server: Pking - Will be transformed to an economized

Well it’s summer time

So, I decided it’s time to start up in RSPS again and make a new server.

This time my goals are way higher though. Before I aimed for content only. Now, I aim for content and stability.

I was going to do a development team but I decided I’m better off going solo. Sorry to anyone who applied We can work on something some other time though, I promise!

                       [b][size=14pt]My Goals[/size][/b]
              Clean Dead Codes
             Object Orientated (Thanks for suggestions from The Soul)
             Give the server some uniqueness
             Economize server (v2 relied on shops and NPC drops)
            Add Some new features
           Make the client nice and pretty
           Rewrite an entire skill or two (Still debating which ones - Thanks for the suggestion JaydenD12)
          Rewrite combat system
          Remove stupid customs
          Remove quests
          Add some 474 items
         More coming soon...

                            [b][size=14pt]Media[/size][/b]

[size=8pt]Clan Chat - I DO NOT TAKE CREDIT FOR THIS

development1-1.jpg772×528

GUI - This was by me, believe it or not

[/size]
May 26th -
Fixed up Barrows rewards
development6.jpg771×527

Cleaned up the home, spread out npcs, portals and added new dialouges
development3-1.jpg772×527

development5.jpg766×525

development4.jpg770×531

More coming soon…

                          [b][size=14pt]Credits[/size][/b]
  • Mackenzie (ChaosPkers)
  • Kingdomkey01 and Danielle - Always been my right hand guys Kingdom does a lot to help me and he puts up with a lot of my shit so I owe him. Thanks

More credits as more people help

Thanks for reading! Reply and wish me lucks.

If you have any suggestions leave it here please, like this:

My suggestion(s) -

If this is replacing an old feature, what would you say is wrong with it? -

If the coder is unable to do this, could you help? -
